Message.Msg: French problems do not touch Coca-Cola company. Perfect one

Message.Title: Ready for this? PLSB on the MOVE
Message.Msg: I can really see PLSB being the next vitamin water type product to get bought out within the next year. Mid term this is a HUGE winner and potential is limitless.

Message.Title: Poor KO getting a little KO by SODASTREAM
Message.Msg: Too funny. Soda volume down 5% in dec lets see what happens in the 1st q.

Message.Title: mission impossible
Message.Msg: Again and again back to 37 of lower. I begin to hate this stock. Big investors are aware of this company had reached its profit capacity. Best times are behind us.

Message.Title: Game changing report - PLSB
Message.Msg: Rumor on the street is that a Major Company Awareness Campaign is scheduled to kick off the next couple of days on PLSB

Message.Title: Squeeze play in PLSB
Message.Msg: CocaCola will aquire PLSB within a year, I willing to put my money where my mouth is. Their numbers and products just don't lie. Up and coming company for sure.
interesting what u say with that coca-colas. As we can see, report prediction was perfect for today. Good post
Just more spam. Don't bother reading it. Fake screen names touting it and a VIRUS as an added extra. !!!

December 2012 was the 10th warmest December on record; December 2011 was the 26th (out of 118 years). December 2011 was just about as warm in the northern United States as December 2012, so not really. Anyone who follows Coke knows the growth is internationally where per capita consumption is miniscule (China and India in particular) in comparison to the United States and Mexico. I don't think either Coke or Pepsi are sitting idly by without other beverage alternatives to soda.

Funny you mention China, India and Mexico. Sodastream is also setting up shop in these countries. They will get the heavy soda drinker that is Ko's challenge. 4.9% decrease in DEC will IMO lead to an 8% decrease in the 1st q. Sodastream sold 500,000 machines plus during the holiday season. The tipping point was when Sodastream hot the shelf's in WMT back in July. KO is going to have a hard time keeping the multiple is all I'm saying when they are about to loose many customers to Sodastream.

Message.Title: KO Earnings coming 2/12/13
Message.Msg: fourth Quarter Earnings Announcement Expected: KO has confirmed that earnings will be announced 02/12/2013. With 14 analysts covering KO, the consensus EPS estimate is $0.43, and the high and low estimates are $0.45 and $0.42, respectively
